params._owner: The address to be added as an owner.

clearBlacklist(address).details: This effectively resets the transfer history for that token.

params.token: The address of the token whose blacklist should be cleared.

params._owner: The address that will be set as the initial owner.

transfer(address,address,uint256).details: Reverts if the token has already been transferred to the given recipient in the current version.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to transfer.
params.token: The address of the BEP20 token.

addOwner(address).notice: Adds a new owner to the repository.

clearBlacklist(address).notice: Clears the blacklist for a given token by incrementing its version.

constructor.notice: Constructor that sets the initial owner.

transfer(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers a specified amount of a BEP20 token to a recipient.

documentation.text:
@title ITokenRepo Interface
 @notice Interface for a token repository contract that can transfer tokens.

@notice Mapping to track when a token was transferred to a recipient.
 @dev _transferredVersion[token][recipient] returns the version number when the transfer occurred.

@notice Constructor that sets the initial owner.
 @param _owner The address that will be set as the initial owner.

@notice Modifier that restricts access to only owners.
 @dev Reverts if msg.sender is not found in the owners array.
